Psychologist in Singapore

Hi and welcome to my website!

I'm a 31 year old Norwegian with a relentless curiosity about the world and the people in it. During my lifetime I've hitchhiked across the states, I've played over 2000 hours of video games, I've caught angler fish weilding only a knife, and I've taught university level inferential statistics.

This website is currently under construction
I've decided to put up this work in progress in order to push myself towards finalizing it. Soon there!
